items.question: we still wait new episode, or is that first season for just 5 episodes ?
items.answer: There will be 5 more episodes coming out later this year. So far a small clip from Episode 7 has been seen, that was at Adult Swim Festival 2019

items.question: Why did Genndy Tartakovsky put caveman and dinosaurs together when they were separated by 65 million of years of evolution?
items.answer: It is a cartoon, not a documentary. It's okay to have anachronisms as part of the story line.
